name: Valerian Tales
description:
Welcome to Valeria!

This city is full of wonders and mysteries. Its a real shame we are going to explore its worse side. So prepare for unsavory characters, bad situations and the sour taste of cheap licuor and wrong decisions. Follow the adventures of Ryan Leaf. Former smuggler while he struggles to find a foothold in this new world, full of machines, greed and new social problems.

Valerian Tales is a visual novel, with regular updates expanding the story. You play as Ryan Leaf and you choose the path he'll take. Find all the clues in each episode and think carefully to get the best outcome.
